description: Try our easy to follow Falafels with Spring Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Falafel,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Falafels with Spring Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 cups salad leaves, tomato, cucumber and sprouts (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse chickpeas and dry well. Place into a food processor with onion, garlic, parsley, spices and baking powder. Process until a paste forms. Transfer to a bowl and add enough of the flour until mixture holds together. It is best to mix the flour in using your hands.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Shape the mixture into small patties and arrange on tray, using a tablespoonful for each. Spray well with oil and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and dry.
Combine yoghurt and mint in a small bowl. Arrange salad on serving plates with falafels and spoon over some of the dressing.
